item.title: Chapter by chapter summary of Dr. Jekyll & Mr. Hyde
item.description: This is a chapter by chapter summary of the book ‘Dr Jekyll and mr. Hyde’ adapted by Oxford University, it’s an online book shipped with B1 Language for Life, a book for the first year of high school used in Italy.
